xwikidoc.content:
#** * Dynamic tables to load users to add to workspace group *# ## Load extensions $xwiki.jsx.use("XWSCode.AddMembersToWorkspace") $xwiki.ssx.use("XWSCode.AddMembersToWorkspace") #set($togroup=$request.group) #set($groupName = $msg.get("xws.group.${togroup}")) #set($args = $util.arrayList) #set($void = $args.add($groupName)) 1.1 $msg.get('xws.admin.adduserstogroup', $args) #info($msg.get('xws.admin.addusershelp'))
$msg.get("ui.ajaxTable.loading")
$msg.get("xws.admin.availableusers")
 
 
$msg.get("xws.admin.availablegroups")
 
 
$msg.get('xws.admin.selectedusers')
$msg.get('commons.form.cancel') $msg.get("xws.admin.adduserstospace", $args)
{pre} ## Initialize the ASS Table... {/pre}
